turkish_example_sentence: O tehlikeli bölgeden vaktinde ayrılmış olsaydı, kötü kazadan kurtulurdu
english_example_sentence: If he had left the dangerous area on time, he would have escaped the bad accident
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он покинул опасную зону вовремя, он бы избежал плохой аварии
